info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:27AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Madison County through 945 AM EDT... At 927 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hamilton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eaton, Hamilton, Pecksport, Pierceville and Hubbardsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
